timeline.message: Remove checkstyle and run "check" target during PR

timeline.bodyText: Is the rename to generic name Builder intended?
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: It's not rename, it's re-import! No, it was not intended.
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: @jkwatson I just talked about this issue at the last meeting and we run into it in the same week :P It does make me consider biting the bullet and replacing AutoValue with top-level builders if it can prevent this sort of trouble for end users.
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I like DBInfo.Builder better than DBInfoBuilder, but ya, I see what you're talking about now, and would not disagree with such a change
replies.author: trask
